pkgmetadata.longdescription: # hugegraph-pythonA Python SDK for Apache HugeGraph, maintained by [cvte research data-mining team](https://github.com/cvte-research-datamining/hugegraph-python).This project currently in alpha testing, will open source the code soon.# Installation## PyPihttps://pypi.org/project/hugegraph-python/```shellpip3 install hugegraph-python```## Install from sourcerelease soon# Examples```pythonfrom hugegraph.connection import PyHugeGraph# init clientclient = PyHugeGraph("127.0.0.1", "8080", user="admin", pwd="pwd", graph="hugegraph")# schemaschema = client.schema()schema.getVertexLabels()# graphg = client.graph()g.getVertexById("1:tom")g.close()# gremlingremlin = client.gremlin()gremlin.exec("g.V().limit(10)")```Any questions contact [ming@apache.org](ming@apache.org)- TODO - document - ut - ci - more api
